cause.description:
This cause has been set up with the belief that neither evolution nor intelligent design can be proven beyond doubt, and therefore it should be required that both subjects should be offered in our public schools.
1. The choice as to what viewpoint should be learned should be left up to the student and/or the parent(s) of that student and no one else
2. Religion has nothing to do with it. Both evolution and intelligent design offer valid evidences to support their theories
cause.mission: demonstrate that intelligent design should be taught in schools.
cause.name: Intelligent Design
